channel.title: How to add ::vote command client sided, +another thing.(will rep++)
channel.description: source: 317 pi Okay so there's two things. I'm releasing a client update so ::vote works. (I can't get it to work client sided). So I have 2 questions.. 1) How do I let people that have the old client know that they need a new download? 2) Where do I add the code for ::vote and what is the code? :D (im assuming client.java, but where in client.java? :p)

item.title: How to add ::vote command client sided, +another thing.(will rep++)

@RS2006Phat wrote:

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.dc:creator: @RS2006Phat RS2006Phat
item.description:
@RS2006Phat wrote:

commands.java doesn’t exist in my client folder, so I’m going to try to add it server sided, but when I originally tried doing voting commands server sided they didn’t work, which is why I wanted it cleint sided. But ima go try the code you posted in commands.java in the source folder and see what happens, then i’ll edit my post and say what happened.
hold on.

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:140: error: cannot find symbol {sendQuest("www.runelocus.com/toplist/details-1042-2006ScapeNeed_Staff_247_PK.html", 12000); ^ symbol: method sendQuest(String,int) location: class Commands Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
